original: Ahlberg, Josef Alfred Herman, bankdirektör, Karlshamn, f. 11/11/81 i Växjö av I. A. A. o. Augusta Lindahl. G. 16 m. Agnes Lundhgren. — Stud:ex. 02, univ:stud. 03-04, res:-off:ex. 06, Gbgs hand :inst. 07. Und:-löjtn. v. Södra sk. inf :reg. 06, löjtn. 13. Anst. i Bank A-B Södra Sv:e i Hälsingborg 07, förste bokhåll. i Väs-stervdk 07, anst. i Banque des Pays du Nord i Paris o. i Dresdner Bank i London 11-13, bokhåll. v. Bank A-B Sö. Sv:es huvikont. 13, förest, f. in-kassoiavd. 18, intr. i A-B Sv. Hand:-bankens’ tjänst 19, kamr. i Kristianstad 21, led. av styr. f. kont. i Karlshamn 25 samt dir. där.
translated: Ahlberg, Josef Alfred Herman, bank director, born on November 11, 1881 in Växjö to I.A.A. and Augusta Lindahl. Married to Agnes Lundhgren for 16 years. Completed secondary school in 1902, university studies from 1903-1904, and reserve officer training in 1906. Attended Gothenburg Handelsinstitut in 1907. He served as second lieutenant in the Södra sk. inf. regiment from 1906 and became a lieutenant in 1913. He worked for Bank AB Södra Sverige in Hälsingborg in 1907 and as a primary accountant in Västervik the same year. He was employed at Banque des Pays du Nord in Paris and Dresdner Bank in London from 1911-1913. In 1913, he became an accountant for Bank AB Södra Sverige and was promoted to manager of the cash department in 1918. In 1919, he joined the Swedish Handelsbanken and became a chamberlain in Kristianstad in 1921. He was a member of the board of directors for Karlshamn's bank in 1925 and was appointed as a director there.
